text: Nondescripts Cricket Club, based in Colombo, has been active since 1888. The team has first-class status, and competes in the Major League Tournament which they have won 16 times (including twice shared), most recently in 2013–14. They were runners-up in 2024–25. Their home ground is the Nondescripts Cricket Club Ground on Maitland Place in Colombo. ==References== Category:First-class cricket teams in Sri Lanka Category:1888 establishments in Sri Lanka
title: Nondescripts Cricket Club
